eu_initiatives: The ECCT presents it's annual Position Papers to relevant stakeholders in Brussels every year for the purpose of keeping them up to date on developments in Taiwan. Most recent issue published on 15 November 2017 and is available for free download on the ECCT website
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: The European Business Organisations Worldwide Network #E01267#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1267#Member#C
relevant_communication:
The ECCT is currently implementing the EBRC programme in Taiwan which is an EU project. The project runs for a period of 4 years and is scheduled to end at the end in 2018. 
 
The ECCT is a partner in the upcoming GNSSasia 3 programme which will start in early 2018.
goals__remit: Advocacy toward Taiwan government agencies on behalf of European companies operating in Taiwan
